tmuxr 0.2.4.9001
  • Reference

tmuxr: Manage 'tmux' Sessions, Windows, and Panes

Source: R/tmuxr-package.R
tmuxr-package.Rd

Create, control, and capture 'tmux' sessions, windows, and panes using a pipeable API.
